original_text: Because of that, the paths that they travel on will be dark. They will easily slip and fall to the ground. I will cause terrible trouble to happen to them. I will decide the time when I will punish them.’ That is what the Lord says. Because of that, the paths that they travel on will be dark.
korean_text: 그러므로 그들의 길이 그들에게 어두운 가운데 미끄러운 곳과 같이 되고 그들이 밀어냄을 당하여 그 길에 엎드러질 것이라 그들을 벌하는 해에 내가 그들에게 재앙을 내리리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: the paths that they travel on will be dark.
I will cause terrible trouble to happen to them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 끔찍한 재앙을 일으킬 것이다.

sentences.original_text: That is what the Lord says.
the paths that they travel on will be dark.
